// My program name

Actuator button0 on PIN0 // actuator on PIN0 on the hardware
Actuator button1 on PIN1 // actuator on PIN1 on the hardware
Sensor led0 on PIN3      // sensor on PIN3 on the hardware

// the initial state of the program
initial state1 {
    led0 is LOW                      // power OFF led0
    when button0 is HIGH then state2 // switch to state 2
}

state2 {
    led0 is HIGH                     // power ON led0
    when button1 is HIGH then state1 // switch to state 1
    after 5000ms then state1         // automatically switch to state 1
}
